header.description: Systems Engineer and Web Developer from Cartagena, Colombia. Passionate about creating efficient technological solutions.

personal.title: Who am I?
personal.description:
I am Luis Alberto Gómez Arteaga, a Systems Engineer graduated from Fundación Universitaria Tecnológico Comfenalco in Cartagena, Colombia.

I am passionate about developing efficient technological solutions, applying best programming practices, and always maintaining a user-centered approach.

My objective is to continue expanding my knowledge of new technologies, strengthen the skills I have already acquired, and keep gaining experience as a developer in both backend and frontend.

perfil.title: My Profile
perfil.description:
Full-Stack Developer with +4 years of experience building web applications.

Skilled in frontend development using JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular, with basic knowledge of Vue.js. I design responsive, accessible interfaces.

Experienced in backend development with Java and Spring Boot, focusing on RESTful APIs and microservices. I apply SOLID principles and work with layered and hexagonal architectures. Proficient in relational databases like MySQL.

items.name: People Agenda
items.description: Full Stack application developed during my initial training.
